    \index{theia \textit{(package)}!theia.helpers \textit{(package)}!theia.helpers.tools \textit{(module)}|(}
\section{Module theia.helpers.tools}

    \label{theia:helpers:tools}
Defines some generic functions for theia.


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%                               Functions                               %%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

  \subsection{Functions}

    \label{theia:helpers:tools:timer}
    \index{theia \textit{(package)}!theia.helpers \textit{(package)}!theia.helpers.tools \textit{(module)}!theia.helpers.tools.timer \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{timer}(\textit{func})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Decorator function to log execution time of other functions.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{theia:helpers:tools:formatter}
    \index{theia \textit{(package)}!theia.helpers \textit{(package)}!theia.helpers.tools \textit{(module)}!theia.helpers.tools.formatter \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{formatter}(\textit{stringList})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Returns a formatted version of the text formed by the list of lines.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}
